website_summaries.verdict: This bronzer doubles as a self-tanner and is made by a top name in premium cosmetics, but it may not work for everyone.
pros: Citrus-scented bronzer provides an instant glow
Builds lasting color with repeated applications
Vegetable-sourced silicone makes your skin feel like silk
Applies smoothly and feels smooth on the skin
Can be used on the face and body
cons: A few consumers report skin irritation after use
Color has the tendency to look orange on some skin tones

customer_reviews.title: Best Bronzer Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the very very best bronzer ever! I have used it for years!!!! It is a bit spendy but worth it!! It was not available the last few years for some reason and when I couldn’t get it I tried others which fell short for sure. I am elated to see it’s available again! It came with a rip on the bottom seam and all over the inside package. This is the very first tome I have ever had an issue with Amazon. Oh well. I will make due. Try it. You’ll love it and I’m not getting anything free for writing this
customer_reviews.author: GailO

customer_reviews.title: I used this only on my legs and it was easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Giving 5 stars because my problem was not with the product itself. I used this only on my legs and it was easy to apply, did not have a foul smell, produced a rich brown color. However, I am allergic to self-tanners and instead of testing a small patch, I completely covered my legs. Within 24hrs of color development I had an incredibly itchy rash/bumps covering my legs entirely. If you are not allergic to self-tanners, this will be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Shimmy0099

customer_reviews.title: Still will buy
customer_reviews.text: I do like the product as a fast tan but it does have a smell of a chemical lotion. I will still buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Vejvoda

customer_reviews.title: I have always used this product & loved it. I ordered an extra one & just ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always used this product & loved it. I ordered an extra one & just opened it. It is orange & my others were always a tan color. I will not order this product from Amazon again. Maybe the recent claims about fake products is really true. I would return it but I'm passed the return date.
customer_reviews.author: I. W.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me but I found it to have an unpleasant, strong smell, color fades completely after just one day and is very orange.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Alcock

customer_reviews.title: Best product I’ve used.
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to try it at first, but it doesn’t streak or turn you orange.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: seems like last year it was a tad better
customer_reviews.text: seems like last year it was a tad better. Great thing is the smell is great as opposed to most self-tanners. I think I need to apply for several days in a row to get the look I want.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good self tanner
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good self tanner. It provides a good color right at application, and also self tans. Better smell than most self tanners.
customer_reviews.author: PDXSHOEGAL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product but pricey. I use it on my legs for an instant tan and it is somewhat camouflaging for imperfections.
customer_reviews.author: DebKenn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite tanner. It shows up right away and doesn't have an orange look. Very natural.
customer_reviews.author: ParisLove

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adequate self tanner but smells strongly of old pennies. It's kind of gross.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Wife loves it and has used many different brands but likes this one the best
customer_reviews.author: Stan C

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, it's the best self tanner out there!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have darker olive skin and this stuff is amazing I usually exfoliate on the shower so my skin is smooth and then apply this every where, even my face and it gives the most wonderful glow. I usually do two applications on legs and arms. I love this stuff I can't get enough of it!
customer_reviews.author: Mason Basten

customer_reviews.title: Great for guys!
customer_reviews.text: Great color that you can see on your fingers before application, no waiting--and you can tell how much to use so you don't put too much on. Great for a guy-not like putting makeup on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They no longer sell it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the product before, however they have discontinued it
customer_reviews.author: Leisa Roundtree

customer_reviews.title: Works fabulous Only complaint is the breakouts I get (comes ...
customer_reviews.text: Works fabulous Only complaint is the breakouts I get (comes with lots of blackheads)
customer_reviews.author: Mrsboss

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend! Great on face also
customer_reviews.text: Faithful user of this product. I highly recommend! Great on face also.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Product is good. Applies smoothly and doesn't smell as bad as other products out there. It gives out a pretty good color and doesn't look fake.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie P

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best natural self tanner, I do not lay out due to skin cancer and this product gives you a natural glow!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Unnaceptable product
customer_reviews.text: Although this product came in the same container as I have purchased it before through a salon, it was a big disappointment! It was more creamy with diluted color and after it dried it would wipe off with a slight brush of fabric or tissue. It made a mess of my cloths. I cannot use it and it wasn't cheap. Unacceptable product. I would like a refund. I would not waste money again. I wonder if there are two different types of Tantasia? The one I used previously did not wipe off and lasted a good week. I did not have to apply it every day. Please Respond.
customer_reviews.author: ezhra martin

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Works well. Plus you can see where you rubbed it because it has a bronzer in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Orange!
customer_reviews.text: Super orange when it comes out of the tube and smells really bad. Non-comedogenic, so at least it didn't make my face break out. Color only lasts a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: PDX1981

customer_reviews.title: Self Tanner I Love
customer_reviews.text: I first saw this self tanner at my doctor's office. I didn't purchase it then, as I thought it was much too expensive(they did tell me it's wonderful). I saw this online, so I decided to order it. I've tried so many self tanners I can't believe it, but this is by far, the BEST! The only complaint I have, is that it is expensive & I try to make it last as long as I can because of this. It would be nice if the purchase price were less expensive!
customer_reviews.author: pookie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is really the best self tanning product I've used. Color more natural also. I was careful to apply evenly and rub in thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: LizzieC

customer_reviews.title: Works great and smells great.
customer_reviews.text: This is great and smells awesome unlike other self tanners. Only thing I wish it came with an application mitt.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M Slone

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend This Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is a bit expensive but because I'm allergic to many things, this product is as close to all natural which I can use on my skin without any after effects. Would highly recommend this product to anyone who has similiar allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Bissonnette

customer_reviews.title: ... every tanner out there and this is by far superior to them all
customer_reviews.text: I have used every tanner out there and this is by far superior to them all. Easy to put on, color within the hour and even better 12 hours later. It lasts for a week or ten days. I used all summer and used 1 tube. Awesome tanner!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. McFee

customer_reviews.title: they should return to their prior formula which was great for years
customer_reviews.text: They've changed the formula...it used to be instant color and now it's barely tanning my skin. They significantly reduced the color...they should return to their prior formula which was great for years!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Gray

customer_reviews.title: Watery Mess!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy! The last two arrived thin a d watery in consistancy. Leaks from Tube. Difficult to apply because it’s so thin and drippy. Cannot travel with it without rolling tube up in paper towels and plastic baggie.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G. Menke

customer_reviews.title: Color is great, transfer to clothes, furniture, bedding is not so great
customer_reviews.text: The instant color is great when you need results, FAST. Not so great: even after it dries, this tanner transfers to anything and everything. Smudges onto clothes. Stains bedding. After sweating (the day after application) it stained the back of my light-colored shirt. Bought directly from manufacture, so not a counterfeit. Beware of the mess!
customer_reviews.author: Shoshana B.

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I actually received a sample of this, but it was so small that I just mixed it in a bottle of lotion and used it. I noticed a difference in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: massie block

customer_reviews.title: Smell is beyond horrible
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst smelling product I have ever come into contact with. Its a metallic/blood smell. Unusable, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Doran

product_meta.title: jane iredale Tantasia Self Tanner and Bronzer, 4.20 oz.
product_meta.description:
The tinted formulation provides instant bronzing and optimal application control. A unique blend of ingredients work with your skin to gradually develop a customized, even, natural-looking tan. Vegetable-sourced silicone makes your skin feel like silk. The sensitivity tested formula makes it ideal for use on face and body. The delicate citrus scent is uplifting and has none of the unpleasant after-smell often associated with self tanners.

BRAND STORY
jane iredale is a comprehensive line of mineral makeup developed to enhance the lives of women by delivering personal, natural beauty to lift her health and spirit.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
